#labels Phase-Requirements


= Introduction =

*jsUML2* - A lightweight HTML5/javascript library for UML 2 diagramming. It allows the developer to easily embed UML 2 diagram in his web applications, just invoking a few javascript methods.

== Team ==
 * Leader and supervisor: 
   * José Raúl Romero, PhD (University of Córdoba, Spain)
 * Developer(s): 
   * Martin Vega-Leal, BSc
